title: The Favorites - NFL Week 18 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 18 Gambling Preview
description:
For the first time ever, the NFL has a Week 18 slate and Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of the Action Network are ready for it! Together they go through a wild slate of strange divisional matchups steeped in intrigue around player availability, injury and COVID concerns. But just like Antonio Brown, they are ready to whip off their metaphorical shirts and dance off the field of battle as an adoring crowd cheers! So gear up for the last 16-game menu of the season, and prepare to bet some big numbers, folks.

KC DEN - 13 MIN

DAL PHL - 14 MIN

PIT BLT - 16 MIN

CIN CLE - 19 MIN

TEN HOU - 21 MIN

WFT NYG - 24 MIN

CHI MIN - 26 MIN

IND JAX - 28 MIN

GB DET - 35 MIN

BUF NYJ - 36 MIN

NO ATL - 38 MIN

LAR SF - 40 MIN

NE MIA - 42 MIN

SEA AZ - 43 MIN

CAR TB -43 MIN

LAC LV - 46 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
